MS MCQs

    Create knowledge management solutions in Dynamics 365 Customer Service

    »

    1. You have a knowledge article in English that must be translated into Spanish, French, and German. You’ve already defined the Spanish version of the article. You select the Translate button and set the language to French. What language will the article text be in?

      French.

      English.

      Spanish.

      German.


    2. An article’s rating is calculated based on what?

      Feedback that’s captured for the article.

      The number of times that an article is viewed.

      Notes that are added to the article.

      All activities that are added to the article.


    3. A published knowledge article is set to expire in three weeks. Which of the following statements about expired articles is correct?

      The article will be put into draft mode.

      The article is available for searches but will be tagged as expired.

      The article will no longer be available in searches.

      The article will be archived.
